long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turning the internet into a classroom.

EdWorldo allows teachers to embed knowledge checks onto any public website via an overlay. Now students no longer have to split their attention between paper and screen as they immerse themselves in educational articles, and teachers can have students’ answers graded automatically digitally.

Have questions? Email som.gupta@snssystem.com
